title: Video: FKA Twigs x inc. – FKA x inc.
content:
Struggling to put into words just how beautiful this new video from FKA Twigs x inc.

is. Directed by Nick Walker and Twigs herself, it’s devastatingly composed, fitting the stunning track itself. Selling out in a matter of hours, FKA x inc. will see a release in April on 7″ vinyl, along with a colour, 8 page zine. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
